chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
During the charging process, a notice appears: Liquid, remove the cable. The phone gets hot at that time. It's been in my possession for three weeks and hasn't come into contact with any liquids. Additionally, the battery drains very quickly. After 8 hours of non-use, the battery is only at 5% without any background apps running.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed.

Regards,
TB
